title: Doubletalk
creator_credit: Alan Beattie and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Shows a young man calling for his first date with a girl when he is invited in to meet her parents. The sound track reveals not only the spoken conversation, but the unspoken thoughts of all the characters.
creator_credit_for_label: Alan Beattie and Learning Corporation of America
